CreateApiCache.name: CreateApiCache
CreateApiCache.description: Grants permissions to create an API cache in AppSync

CreateApiKey.name: CreateApiKey
CreateApiKey.description:
Grants permissions to create a unique key that you can distribute to clients who are
                                                executing your API

CreateDataSource.name: CreateDataSource
CreateDataSource.description: Grants permissions to create a DataSource object

CreateFunction.name: CreateFunction
CreateFunction.description: Grants permissions to create a new Function object

CreateGraphqlApi.name: CreateGraphqlApi
CreateGraphqlApi.description:
Grants permissions to creates a GraphqlApi object, which is the top level AppSync
                                                resource

CreateResolver.name: CreateResolver
CreateResolver.description:
Grants permissions to create a Resolver object. A resolver converts incoming requests
                                                into a format that a data source can understand, and converts the data source's responses
                                                into GraphQL

CreateType.name: CreateType
CreateType.description: Grants permissions to create a Type object

DeleteApiCache.name: DeleteApiCache
DeleteApiCache.description: Grants permissions to delete an API cache in AppSync

DeleteApiKey.name: DeleteApiKey
DeleteApiKey.description: Grants permissions to delete an API key

DeleteDataSource.name: DeleteDataSource
DeleteDataSource.description: Grants permissions to delete a DataSource object

DeleteFunction.name: DeleteFunction
DeleteFunction.description: Grants permissions to delete a Function object

DeleteGraphqlApi.name: DeleteGraphqlApi
DeleteGraphqlApi.description:
Grants permissions to delete a GraphqlApi object. This will also clean up every AppSync
                                                resource below that API

DeleteResolver.name: DeleteResolver
DeleteResolver.description: Grants permissions to delete a Resolver object

DeleteType.name: DeleteType
DeleteType.description: Grants permissions to delete a Type object

FlushApiCache.name: FlushApiCache
FlushApiCache.description: Grants permissions to flush an API cache in AppSync

GetApiCache.name: GetApiCache
GetApiCache.description: Grants permissions to read information about an API cache in AppSync

GetDataSource.name: GetDataSource
GetDataSource.description: Grants permissions to retrieve a DataSource object

GetFunction.name: GetFunction
GetFunction.description: Grants permissions to retrieve a Function object

GetGraphqlApi.name: GetGraphqlApi
GetGraphqlApi.description: Grants permissions to retrieve a GraphqlApi object

GetIntrospectionSchema.name: GetIntrospectionSchema
GetIntrospectionSchema.description: Grants permissions to retrieve the introspection schema for a GraphQL API

GetResolver.name: GetResolver
GetResolver.description: Grants permissions to retrieve a Resolver object

GetSchemaCreationStatus.name: GetSchemaCreationStatus
GetSchemaCreationStatus.description: Grants permissions to retrieve the current status of a schema creation operation

GetType.name: GetType
GetType.description: Grants permissions to retrieve a Type object

GraphQL.name: GraphQL
GraphQL.description: Grants permissions to send a GraphQL query to a GraphQL API

ListApiKeys.name: ListApiKeys
ListApiKeys.description: Grants permissions to list the API keys for a given API

ListDataSources.name: ListDataSources
ListDataSources.description: Grants permissions to list the data sources for a given API

ListFunctions.name: ListFunctions
ListFunctions.description: Grants permissions to list the functions for a given API

ListGraphqlApis.name: ListGraphqlApis
ListGraphqlApis.description: Grants permissions to list your GraphQL APIs

ListResolvers.name: ListResolvers
ListResolvers.description: Grants permissions to list the resolvers for a given API and type

ListResolversByFunction.name: ListResolversByFunction
ListResolversByFunction.description: Grants permissions to list the resolvers that are associated with a specific function

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permissions to list the tags for a resource

ListTypes.name: ListTypes
ListTypes.description: Grants permissions to list the types for a given API

SetWebACL.name: SetWebACL
SetWebACL.description: Grants permissions to set web ACL

StartSchemaCreation.name: StartSchemaCreation
StartSchemaCreation.description:
Grants permissions to add a new schema to your GraphQL API. This operation is asynchronous
                                                - GetSchemaCreationStatus can show when it has completed

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permissions to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permissions to untag a resource

UpdateApiCache.name: UpdateApiCache
UpdateApiCache.description: Grants permissions to update an API cache in AppSync

UpdateApiKey.name: UpdateApiKey
UpdateApiKey.description: Grants permissions to update an API key for a given API

UpdateDataSource.name: UpdateDataSource
UpdateDataSource.description: Grants permissions to update a DataSource object

UpdateFunction.name: UpdateFunction
UpdateFunction.description: Grants permissions to update an existing Function object

UpdateGraphqlApi.name: UpdateGraphqlApi
UpdateGraphqlApi.description: Grants permissions to updates a GraphqlApi object

UpdateResolver.name: UpdateResolver
UpdateResolver.description: Grants permissions to update a Resolver object

UpdateType.name: UpdateType
UpdateType.description: Grants permissions to update a Type object
